verses.verse: I will stand <WH5975> <WH8799> upon my watch <WH4931>, and set <WH3320> <WH8691> me upon the tower <WH4692>, and will watch <WH6822> <WH8762> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> what he will say <WH1696> <WH8762> unto me, and what I shall answer <WH7725> <WH8686> when I am reproved <WH8433>.

And the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> me, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Write <WH3789> <WH8798> the vision <WH2377>, and make it plain <WH874> <WH8761> upon tables <WH3871>, that he may run <WH7323> <WH8799> that readeth <WH7121> <WH8802> it.

For the vision <WH2377> is yet for an appointed time <WH4150>, but at the end <WH7093> it shall speak <WH6315> <WH8686>, and not lie <WH3576> <WH8762>: though it tarry <WH4102> <WH8698>, wait <WH2442> <WH8761> for it; because it will surely <WH935> <WH8800> come <WH935> <WH8799>, it will not tarry <WH309> <WH8762>.
Behold, his soul <WH5315> which is lifted up <WH6075> <WH8795> is not upright <WH3474> <WH8804> in him: but the just <WH6662> shall live <WH2421> <WH8799> by his faith <WH530>.

Yea also, because he transgresseht <WH898> <WH8802> by wine <WH3196>, he is a proud <WH3093> man <WH1397>, neither keepeth at home <WH5115> <WH8799>, who enlargeth <WH7337> <WH8689> his desire <WH5315> as SH'ol <WH7585>, and is as death <WH4194>, and cannot be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>, but gathereth <WH622> <WH8799> unto him all nations <WH1471>, and heapeth <WH6908> <WH8799> unto him all people <WH5971>:

Shall not all these take up <WH5375> <WH8799> a parable <WH4912> against him, and a taunting <WH4426> proverb <WH2420> against him, and say <WH559> <WH8799>, Woe <WH1945> to him that increaseht <WH7235> <WH8688> that which is not his! how long? and to him that ladeth <WH3513> <WH8688> himself with thick clay <WH5671> !

Shall they not rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> suddenly <WH6621> that shall bite <WH5391> <WH8802> thee, and awake <WH3364> <WH8799> that shall vex <WH2111> <WH8772> thee, and thou shalt be for booties <WH4933> unto them?

Because thou hast spoiled <WH7997> <WH8804> many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, all the remnant <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> shall spoil <WH7997> <WH8799> thee; because of men's <WH120> blood <WH1818>, and for the violence <WH2555> of the land <WH776>, of the city <WH7151>, and of all that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein.

Woe <WH1945> to him that coveteth <WH1214> <WH8802> an evil <WH7451> covetousness <WH1215> to his house <WH1004>, that he may set <WH7760> <WH8800> his nest <WH7064> on high <WH4791>, that he may be delivered <WH5337> <WH8736> from the power <WH3709> of evil <WH7451> !
Thou hast consulted <WH3289> <WH8804> shame <WH1322> to thy house <WH1004> by cutting off <WH7096> <WH8800> many <WH7227> people <WH5971>, and hast sinned <WH2398> <WH8802> against thy soul <WH5315>.
For the stone <WH68> shall cry out <WH2199> <WH8799> of the wall <WH7023>, and the beam out <WH3714> of the timber <WH6086> shall answer <WH6030> <WH8799> it.
Woe <WH1945> to him that buildeth <WH1129> <WH8802> a town <WH5892> with blood <WH1818>, and stablisheth <WH3559> <WH8790> a city <WH7151> by iniquity <WH5766> !

Behold, is it not of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> that the people <WH5971> shall labour <WH3021> <WH8799> in the very <WH1767> fire <WH784>, and the people <WH3816> shall weary <WH3286> <WH8799> themselves for very <WH1767> vanity <WH7385> ?
For the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with the knowledge <WH3045> <WH8800> of the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068>, as the waters <WH4325> cover <WH3680> <WH8762> the sea <WH3220>.

Woe <WH1945> unto him that giveth his neighbour <WH7453> drink <WH8248> <WH8688>, that puttest <WH5596> <WH8764> thy bottle <WH2573> to him, and makest him drunken <WH7937> <WH8763> also, that thou mayest look <WH5027> <WH8687> on their nakedness <WH4589> !

Thou art filled <WH7646> <WH8804> with shame <WH7036> for glory <WH3519>: drink <WH8354> <WH8798> thou also, and let thy foreskin be uncovered <WH6188> <WH8734>: the cup <WH3563> of the YY'S <WH3068> right hand <WH3225> shall be turned <WH5437> <WH8735> unto thee, and shameful spewing <WH7022> shall be on thy glory <WH3519>.

For the violence <WH2555> of Lebanon <WH3844> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8762> thee, and the spoil <WH7701> of beasts <WH929>, which made them afraid <WH2865> <WH8686>, because of men's <WH120> blood <WH1818>, and for the violence <WH2555> of the land <WH776>, of the city <WH7151>, and of all that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein.

What profiteth <WH3276> <WH8689> the graven image <WH6459> that the maker <WH3335> <WH8802> thereof hath graven <WH6458> <WH8804> it; the molten image <WH4541>, and a teacher <WH3384> <WH8688> of lies <WH8267>, that the maker <WH3335> <WH8802> of his work <WH3336> trusteth <WH982> <WH8804> therein, to make <WH6213> <WH8800> dumb <WH483> idols <WH457> ?

Woe <WH1945> unto him that saith <WH559> <WH8802> to the wood <WH6086>, Awake <WH6974> <WH8685>; to the dumb <WH1748> stone <WH68>, Arise <WH5782> <WH8798>, it shall teach <WH3384> <WH8686> ! Behold, it is laid <WH8610> <WH8803> over with gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>, and there is no breath <WH7307> at all in the midst <WH7130> of it.
But the YY <WH3068> is in his holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>: let all the earth <WH776> keep silence <WH2013> <WH8761> before <WH6440> him.
